Physical: Not be limited/handicaped by the pain
Subjective: Think less or not at all about the disease
Relational/ social: Spend quality time with family, friends or colleagues
Therapeutic: Need to think less about treatment and care

Physical: Do not feel any functional discomfort (itching, rash) in my daily activities
Subjective: Do not feel any anxiety from the disease
Relational/ social: Not caring about what people think about me
Therapeutic: Encounter very few, if any, drug discomfort

Physical: Have freedom of movement and activities
Subjective: Feel serene, have peace of mind
